name: United States Steel Corporation v. Monongahela & Ohio Dredging Co., Appellant
name_abbreviation: United States Steel Corp. v. Monongahela & Ohio Dredging Co.

judges: Before Jones, C. J., Bebb, Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Boic and McBkide, JJ. -
parties: United States Steel Corporation v. Monongahela & Ohio Dredging Co., Appellant.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
The judgment in the above captioned case is affirmed on the opinion of Judge Duff of the Court of Common Pleas of Allegheny County.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Cuy L. Warman, with him John A. Metz, Jr., Robert C. MacAlisier, and Metz, Cook, Hanna é Kelly, for appellant.
Frank W. Ittel, with him Reed, Smith, Shaw & Mo-Clay, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
United States Steel Corporation v. Monongahela & Ohio Dredging Co., Appellant.
Argued March 19, 1959.
Before Jones, C. J., Bebb, Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Boic and McBkide, JJ. -
Cuy L. Warman, with him John A. Metz, Jr., Robert C. MacAlisier, and Metz, Cook, Hanna é Kelly, for appellant.
Frank W. Ittel, with him Reed, Smith, Shaw & Mo-Clay, for appellee.
April 20, 1959:
